verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_1
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: hold On ( What-s a Thug to Do ) ?

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: Lyrics by X-Raided .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_3
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: when I was young , I wanted to be man of the house .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_4

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: a dog in the yard , to protect the premises .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_6
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: fuck Good Times , I-m talkin about some of that Cosby shit .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_7
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: four bedroom home , white trimmed with green .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_8
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i-ll be a doctor , regular American dream .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_9
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i-ll go to college , obtain some knowledge and a degree .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_10
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i-ll go to Stanford , CSUS , or maybe UCB .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: could go to law school , try to pass the bar .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i could be a fireman , maybe a movie star .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_13
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: could play hoops and be the next Mike J .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: gettin paid for a game I like to play anyway .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: man , so many options , which will I choose ?

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_16
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: pursuin my dreams and I-m willin to pay dues .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_17
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: gotta take care of Mama , I-ma buy her a house too .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_18
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: look out for my sister , the first thing I-ma do .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_19
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: when I-m rich , no_more apartments full of roaches .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_20
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: we-ll have the best of everything , at_least that-s what I-m hopin- .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_21
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: so in the innocence of youth , I stand strong .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_22
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: as my future unfolds I keep holdin on .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_23
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: hold on , never let ' em see you shed a tear .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_24
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: my soul-s gone , on the inside I-ve been dead for years .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: hold on .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_26
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: mama , all my love-s for you .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_27
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: so_much drama in the World , what-s a thug to do ?

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_28
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: now it-s deep , it-s gettin- , it-s gettin kinda hectic .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_29
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: cuz life as an adult ain-t quite what I expected .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: bills to pay and mouths to feed .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i thought it would be easy , I was mistaken .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_33
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: thought my folks would have my back , but they be fakin- .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_34
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i went to the pen instead of college .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_35
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: tryin to have more_than a dollar in my wallet .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_36
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: fucked around and got a girl pregnant .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_37
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: my baby .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_38
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: won-t be neglected the way my Daddy did me .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_39
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: all of my dreams turned to nightmares .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_40
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: and if I tell you about it , maybe you might care .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_41
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i_got_a_girl pregnant but she got an abortion .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_42
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: said I wasn-t disciplined and didn-t have caution .

verse_sdi_var.id: Hold On (What's a Thug to Do?) Lyrics.txt_43
verse_sdi_var.sdivars: didn-t want her only_child to be fatherless .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: she told me I would be dead before next autumn hits .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i disagree , but maybe she-s right in a sense .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: no bullshit .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: hard livin got me on one .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: standin strong .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: holidays come and go kinda quick in the pen .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i got a call from my sister , it-s my birthday again .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i barely noticed , deuce-five to life for murder .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: on Thanksgiving they fed us potato tots and hamburgers .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: i made my bed , but it-s too hard to be layin in it .

verse_sdi_var.sdivars: fightin the drama , but_for some reason I-m stayin in it .
